thread.title: Meghan Trainor Dances With 'Peanuts' Characters in 'Better When I'm Dancing' Video
thread.title_full: Meghan Trainor Dances With 'Peanuts' Characters in 'Better When I'm Dancing' Video

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Meghan Trainor Dances With 'Peanuts' Characters in 'Better When I'm Dancing' Video
text:
Comments The singer invites Snoopy, Charlie Brown, Woodstock and others for a dance party in the video for the track she's recorded for the 'Peanuts' movie. 
Meghan Trainor returned on Wednesday, October 14 with the official music video for "Better When I'm Dancing". The singer invites Snoopy, Charlie Brown, Woodstock and other "Peanuts" character for a dance party in the visuals premiered on Apple Music. The clip opens with black-and-white scenes of some people looking bored while they sit by the street and inside a diner. Trainor then puts smile on everyone's face as she busts out some moves alongside the cute "Peanuts" characters, her co-workers and a lot of strangers. "Better When I'm Dancing" was written by Trainor for the soundtrack of The " Peanuts " movie. The feel-good song's available for instant download for fans who pre-order the album on iTunes ahead of its official release on October 23. In addition to the songbird, the project features a contribution from Flo Rida . Along with Fitz, he recorded a track called "That's What I Like".
